thread.title: 'Blitz build' continues on home for veteran in Johnstown
thread.title_full: 'Blitz build' continues on home for veteran in Johnstown

author: Dave Sutor dsutor@tribdem.com
title: 'Blitz build' continues on home for veteran in Johnstown
text:
JOHNSTOWN, Pa. – Local Navy veteran Darren Hill will be moving into a brand-new house on the 700 block of Somerset Street in Johnstown’s Kernville neighborhood this Thursday.
A welcoming ceremony is scheduled for 3 p.m.
Thunderstorms likely in the morning. Then a chance of scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. Storms may contain strong gusty winds. High 71F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%..
A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible early. Overcast. Low 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.
Updated: September 4, 2025 @ 12:39 am

Dave Sutor is a reporter for The Tribune-Democrat. He can be reached at 814-532-5056. Follow him on Twitter @Dave_Sutor.
